scripts.docs:html: rm -rf build  && ./bin/cmd.js bin/cmd.js lib/*.js --index README.md --dest build/gilk --baseurl /gilk --title gilk --exclude-source
scripts.docs:markdown: rm -rf build  && ./bin/cmd.js bin/cmd.js lib/*.js --index README.md --markdown true --baseurl /gilk --dest build/gilk  --title gilk --exclude-source
